description:
Tseng is the director of the Turks unit within Shinra Electric Power Company in Final Fantasy VII, as well as appearing in several of the Compilation of Final Fantasy VII titles. Tseng is a young man with a slim build, tan skin, straight, long black hair, and dark brown eyes. He has a tilak and sometimes wears his hair in a ponytail when in the field. He is cool-headed and stoic, conducting his duties professionally and concealing his true feelings. A veteran operative and highly trusted in the company, Tseng manages his subordinates http://anidb.net/character/582 [Reno], http://anidb.net/character/25628 [Rude], and Elena, and acts as http://anidb.net/character/25630 [Rufus Shinra`s] right-hand man. He has complicated feelings for http://anidb.net/character/563 [Aerith Gainsborough], who he has watched over since she was a child.
Tseng is an experienced field operative, but mostly works behind the scenes, handling paperwork and relaying orders to his subordinates.
Source: http://finalfantasy.wikia.com/wiki/Tseng
name: Tseng
